education.school: CEAC — Higher Technician in Web App Development
Haslev Midtskolen — Primary and Secondary School

profile.text: Enthusiastic and fast-learning candidate with strong analytical and organizational skills. Experience in digital documentation, file management, website maintenance, and general IT operations. Motivated to expand technical competencies through training and hands-on projects. Committed to a long-term IT career based on reliability, adaptability, and continuous learning.

tasks.task: Managed company website and digital marketing platforms.
Produced and managed content for the corporate YouTube channel.
Primary contact with construction firms for negotiations.
Coordinated communication between clients, agents, and legal teams.
Handled all real estate processes except contract drafting.
Worked on basic programming tasks and small automations.
Led digital organization and cleanup projects.
Supported the technical team with IT tasks.
Ensured safety, access control, water testing, and routines.
Provided customer service and managed transactions.
Operated activity stations such as shooting ranges.
Assisted with technical tasks and event setup.
